```{r}
# read in the data
library(tidyverse)

curves <- read_csv("./data/BG_curves_data.csv")



curves_long <-  curves %>% 
  select(1:22) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = 3:22,
               names_to = "minutes",
               values_to = "value") %>% 
  mutate(minutes = as.integer(minutes))

curves_long %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = minutes, y = value, group = Participant)) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~type_curve)

```
